article.title: Modern Integral Information Systems for Chemistry and Chemical Technology
article.author: Chernyi, A.I.
article.text: At the present time, about 15% of all the world publications of scientific and technical literature relate to chemistry and chemical technology. Each year throughout the world more than 250,000 documents are published: journal papers, specifications for authors' certificates and patents, scientific and technical reports, monographs, etc., and in the last twenty years the number of such documents has increased by an average of 9% a year. In these scientific documents information on 100-150 thousand new chemical compounds is published.
